headline.main: Obama, a Selfie Stick and the Affordable Care Act

docs.abstract: President Obama has made it abundantly clear that he will do almost anything to make sure the Affordable Care Act is a success.

docs.lead_paragraph: Turns out that the Affordable Care Act is no trouble to anybody.
docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column praises Obamacare, pointing out 10 million people have health coverage who did not have it earlier; observes you can tell Affordable Care Act is terrific by looking at people who oppose it.

docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. John Kitzhaber is facing two recall efforts, demands for his resignation, an ethics inquiry into the business dealings of his fiancée and now a criminal investigation.

headline.seo: ‘Kitzhaber Fatigue’ Sets In Over Oregon Governor
headline.main: Love and Politics Collide as Scandals Plague Oregon’s Fourth-Term Governor
headline.print_headline: Love and Politics Collide as Scandals Plague Oregon’s Fourth-Term Governor

docs.abstract: String of scandals bedevils Oregon Gov John Kitzhaber as he begins unprecedented fourth term; his litany of problems includes questions about propriety of business dealings of his fiancee Cylvia Hayes, two petition attempts to recall him, and several newspapers calling for his resignation.
docs.snippet: Gov. John Kitzhaber is facing two recall efforts, demands for his resignation, an ethics inquiry into the business dealings of his fiancée and now a criminal investigation.
